short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to make inline notes and references unselectables or hidden

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This open-source extension allows you to alter the way your browser's selection will interact with inline notes and references.

It was mainly designed for Wikimedia projects (Wikipedia, Wiktionary, ...) and other Mediawiki sites, but works with many other types of sites or documents that contain inline notes and references.

Source code: https://github.com/Wylarel/WikiNoNotes
